content:
It sounds like you're looking to expand your social circle and connect with like-minded people who share your interests!

Reaching out to Alex to grab coffee and discuss 80s music is a great idea! Since you both bonded over your shared love of 80s music at the festival, it's likely that you'll have a lot to talk about. Asking him about his favorite 80s movies is definitely a great topic to explore as well. You might find that you have similar tastes in films, and it could lead to some great conversations about the decade's iconic movies, directors, and actors.

As for Sarah, the freelance writer you met at the coffee shop, it's wonderful that you had a chance encounter with her! It's always exciting to meet new people who share similar interests or have interesting stories to tell. You might consider reaching out to her as well, perhaps to grab coffee or discuss writing-related topics.

Remember, it's all about building connections and fostering relationships. By showing genuine interest in people's passions and hobbies, you can create meaningful connections that might lead to new friendships or even collaborations.

Feel free to ask me any more questions or seek advice on how to approach these conversations. I'm here to help!
